title: QuickCritic
description: A React application that fetches movie and TV show ratings from an API.
longDescription: QuickCritic is a web app for quickly checking movie and TV show ratings. Built with React and TypeScript. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet.
goals: To make it easy to find ratings for movies and TV shows. Lorem ipsum.
techStack: React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, RESTful API, CircleCI, Nginx.

features.title: Ratings Search
features.description: Search for movies and TV shows and view ratings.

challenges.solution: Handled API rate limits and errors gracefully. Lorem ipsum.
